code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';/* import 'particles.js'; */import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ParticlesBackground=()=>{useEffect(()=>{if(window.particlesJS){window.particlesJS('particles-js',{particles:{number:{value:15,density:{enable:true,value_area:300}},color:{value:'white'},shape:{type:'triangle'},opacity:{value:0.8,random:true,anim:{enable:true,speed:1,opacity_min:0.1,sync:false}},size:{value:5,random:true,anim:{enable:true,speed:4,size_min:0.3,sync:false}},line_linked:{enable:true,distance:150,color:'#ffffff',opacity:0.4,width:1},move:{enable:true,speed:2,direction:'none',random:false,straight:false,out_mode:'bounce',bounce:false}},interactivity:{detect_on:'canvas',events:{onhover:{enable:true,mode:'repulse'},onclick:{enable:true,mode:'push'},resize:true}},retina_detect:true});}else{console.error("particlesJS not loaded yet");}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"particles-js",style:{position:'absolute',top:0,left:0,width:'100%',height:'100%',zIndex:-1}});};export default ParticlesBackground;
